tuv.seg: The main function of Seanad Éireann is in relation to legislation
Baineann príomhfheidhm Sheanad Éireann le reachtaíocht
A Bill may start life in either the Dáil or the Seanad
Is féidir Bille a thabhairt chun tosaigh sa Dáil nó sa Seanad
In practice, the vast majority of Bills originate from the Government and are passed by the Dáil first
Go hiondúil, is ón Rialtas a thagann tromlach na mBillí agus déantar iad a rith ar dtús sa Dáil
They are then sent to the Seanad for debate and consideration
Cuirtear ansin iad chuig an Seanad le díospóireacht agus moltaí
Within 90 days, the Seanad may propose amendments, reject or pass a Bill
Taobh istigh de 90 lá is féidir leis an Seanad leasuithe a mholadh, Bille a dhiúltú nó a rith
The Dáil has the power to over-ride the Seanad's rejection of a Bill
Tá cumhacht ag an Dáil diúltú an tSeanaid do Bhille a shárú
The Seanad's powers in relation to Bills for Government spending (Money Bills) are very restricted
Tá cumhachtaí an tSeanaid maidir le Billí a bhaineann le caiteachas an Rialtais (Billí Airgid) fíor theoranta
These Bills cannot start life in the Seanad, they must come from the Dáil
Ní féidir tús a chur le Billí mar seo sa Seanad, ní mór dóibh teacht ón Dáil
The Seanad has only 21 days to consider a Money Bill and cannot make amendments to it
Tá 21 lá ag an Seanad Bille Airgid a phlé agus ní féidir leis leasuithe a dhéanamh air

The Seanad has other functions, which it shares with the Dáil, such as the removal from office of the President or a judge of the Supreme Court, declaring a state of emergency and annulling statutory instruments

Tá feidhmeanna eile ag an Seanad, a roinníonn sé leis an Dáil, mar shampla Uachtarán a chur as oifig nó breitheamh den Chúirt Uachtarach, staid phráinne a ghairm agusionstraim reachtúla a chur ar neamhní
In recent years, parliamentary committees have become an important part of the work of the Seanad
Le blianta beaga anuas is cuid tábhachtach de obair an tSeanaid an pháirt a ghlacann siad i gcoistí parlaiminte
Joint Committees involve both Seanad and Dáil members sitting and voting together on particular issues
Bíonn comhaltaí ón Seanad agus ón Dáil páirteach i gcomhchoistí ag suí lena chéile agus ag caitheamh vótaí le chéile ar cheisteanna faoi leith
Seanad Éireann normally meets on Wednesdays and Thursdays
Maidin Dé Céadaoin agus Déardaoin a thagann Seanad Éireann le chéile go hiondúil
Senators are also involved in drafting amendments to Bills and examining proposals for new legislation
Tá baint ag Seanadóirí freisin le leasuithe do Bhillí a dhreachtú agus moltaí maidir le reachtaíocht nua a scrúdú
They contribute to debates on Bills and other important matters
Bíonn siad páirteach i ndíospóireachtaí ar Bhillí agus ar cheisteanna tábhachtacha eile
They vote on issues in the House
Caitheann siad vótaí ar cheisteanna sa Teach
Senators are not officially separated into political parties
Níl na Seanadóirí roinnte i bpáirtithe polaitiúla go hoifigiúil
However, they usually divide into groups supporting and opposing Government business when voting on issues
Ach, is iondúil go roinníonn siad iad féin i ngrúpaí a thugann tacaíocht do Ghnó an Rialtais nó don fhreasúra nuair atá vóta le caitheamh
Senators have certain privileges as members of the Oireachtas
Tá pribhléidí faoi leith ag Seanadóirí mar bhaill den Oireachtas
They may be disciplined by the House for breach of procedure or abuse of privilege
Is féidir leis an Teach iad a smachtú má sháraíonn siad na rialacha nó má bhaineann siad mí-úsáid as pribhléidí
